meanings.definition: To have the courage to do something.
meanings.sent1: She dares to climb the tall tree.
meanings.sent2: He always dares to speak up for what is right.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse dares to sneak a piece of cheese from the cat.
meanings.sent4: The sun dares to shine through the storm clouds.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight dares to face the dragon in battle.

meanings.definition: Challenges or taunts someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: He dares his friend to jump over the puddle.
meanings.sent2: She dares the class to solve the difficult riddle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dares the bird to a nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: The wind dares the leaves to dance in its playful gusts.
meanings.sent5: The rival team dares the champions to a rematch.
